spec_data.Name: PragmARC
spec_data.Description:
The PragmAda Reusable Components (PragmARCs) is a library of containers,
algorithms and utility components for Ada, ranging from the basic-but-essential
to the high-level.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 12:03:17 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: PragmAda Reusable Components, a component library for Ada
